Text: Grade A Sale CorrectionDue to a technical error a fare in our Grade A Sale notification was posted incorrectly We regret the error and have included a corrected sample fare list below Thank you for your understanding Remember you must purchase your tickets by February Book online where fares are discounted an extra each way Travel may originate in either city and all fares are oneway and do Dulles DallasFort Worth Washington DC Dulles Memphis Washington DC Dulles Tampa Sale Fares other rules and restrictions All fares are oneway All fares are nonrefundable and a per person fee applies to any change made after purchase plus any applicable increase in airfare Travel on sale fares must be purchased no later than February All travel must be complete by June Travel on sale fares to and from Fort Lauderdale Fort Myers Miami Orlando and Tampa must be complete by April and travel to those cities is valid southbound Monday through Wednesday and northbound Tuesday through Thursday Fares have a day advance purchase restriction and may be combined with regular fares to complete an itinerary Travel is not valid on March or on April or on May Travel also may not be available to and from select cities during other periods of high passenger demand Seats are limited and subject to availability Fares dont include segment taxes of for each segment The September th security fee of up to is not included A segment is defined as a takeoff and landing Airport passenger facility charges of up to are not included Fares tofrom Grand Bahama Island do not include in roundtrip taxes As a subscriber to AirTran Airways Net Escapes we send you regular updates on our Internet specials If you need to contact us for any other reason please call us at AIRTRAN or in Atlanta call Please note that any reference to Net Escapes fares Feature City fares or bonus discounts for booking online may ONLY be purchased on our web site Please click UMUaspB and you will be removed immediately Or To unsubscribe mailto or if the emailaddress is not clickable simply copy the text to the right of the mailto command and paste it into your email application and hit send You will be taken off the list immediately Thank you
